values: Hi, not that anyone was "ACTUALLY" reading this thing anyway, but it's nice to know my account is still active. =] The winter has not been a kind one I'm afraid. I'll see if I can come up with a way to explain it without falling into full Blogger putz mode later!

I'm still tinkering around with learning the controls on this new fangled thingy.  Live-Journal keeps timing out everytime I log on.  I assume this is how they get you to buy a full membership. ;)  

Anyway, I'll try to start updating once "Trigun" on Adult Swim wraps up on Tuesday.

Love, Peace, and Gossip

Steve
The picture will change once I reload my actual photo editor.
